data.subject: Ooh La La (LP Ver.)
data.lyric:
Poor old Grandad
 I laughed at all his words
 I thought he was a bitter man
 He spoke of women's way

data.subject: Stay With Me
data.lyric:
In the mornin' don't say you love me
 Cause I'll only kick you out of the door
 I know your name is
